title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Improve DevEx for GenAI Deployments: Dynatrace + Amazon Bedrock (SEC207)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 改善生成式AI部署的开发者体验：Dynatrace + Amazon Bedrock (SEC207)
abstract: Delivering GenAI applications at scale requires powerful infrastructure, Cloud Platform Monitoring, and a developer experience that makes building, testing, and running AI seamless. In this session, Dynatrace and AWS will show how Amazon Bedrock and Dynatrace AI Observability and Agentic AI empower developers to confidently plan, deploy, and observe GenAI applications. You’ll learn how to streamline debugging, monitor performance, control costs, and apply governance without slowing innovation. Gain practical, developer-centric strategies to reduce risk, accelerate delivery, and maximize the impact of your AI investments. This presentation is brought to you by Dynatrace, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 大规模交付GenAI应用需要强大的基础设施、云平台监控以及让构建、测试和运行AI变得无缝的开发者体验。在本次会议中，Dynatrace和AWS将展示Amazon Bedrock和Dynatrace AI可观测性及代理AI如何赋能开发者自信地规划、部署和观察GenAI应用。您将学习如何简化调试、监控性能、控制成本，并在不减缓创新的情况下应用治理。获得实用的、以开发者为中心的策略来降低风险、加速交付并最大化AI投资的影响。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Dynatrace为您呈现。
